   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_npn_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Callback functions
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          init_per_testcase/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   38: 
   39: %% Testcases
   40: -export([validate_empty_protocols_are_not_allowed/1,
   41:          validate_empty_advertisement_list_is_allowed/1,
   42:          validate_advertisement_must_be_a_binary_list/1,
   43:          validate_client_protocols_must_be_a_tuple/1,
   44:          normal_npn_handshake_server_preference/1,
   45:          normal_npn_handshake_client_preference/1,
   46:          fallback_npn_handshake/1,
   47:          fallback_npn_handshake_server_preference/1,
   48:          client_negotiate_server_does_not_support/1,
   49:          no_client_negotiate_but_server_supports_npn/1,
   50:          renegotiate_from_client_after_npn_handshake/1,
   51:          npn_handshake_session_reused/1
   52:         ]).
   53: 
   54: -export([assert_npn/2,
   55:          assert_npn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data/3,
   56:          ssl_send_and_assert_npn/3,
   57:          ssl_send/2,
   58:          ssl_receive/2,
   59:          ssl_receive_and_assert_npn/3,
   60:          connection_info_result/1
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 5}).
   64: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: 
   69: all() ->
   70:     [{group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   71:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   72:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   73:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   74:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   75:     ].
   76: 
   77: groups() ->
   78:     [
   79:      {'tlsv1.2', [], next_protocol_tests()},
   80:      {'tlsv1.1', [], next_protocol_tests()},
   81:      {'tlsv1', [], next_protocol_tests()},
   82:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], next_protocol_tests()},
   83:      {'dtlsv1', [], next_protocol_tests()}
   84:     ].
   85: 
   86: next_protocol_tests() ->
   87:     [validate_empty_protocols_are_not_allowed,
   88:      validate_empty_advertisement_list_is_allowed,
   89:      validate_advertisement_must_be_a_binary_list,
   90:      validate_client_protocols_must_be_a_tuple,
   91:      normal_npn_handshake_server_preference,
   92:      normal_npn_handshake_client_preference,
   93:      fallback_npn_handshake,
   94:      fallback_npn_handshake_server_preference,
   95:      client_negotiate_server_does_not_support,
   96:      no_client_negotiate_but_server_supports_npn,
   97:      renegotiate_from_client_after_npn_handshake,
   98:      npn_handshake_session_reused
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  102:     catch crypto:stop(),
  103:     try crypto:start() of
  104: 	ok ->
  105:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  106:             ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  107: 	    Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  108: 	    ssl_test_lib:cert_options(Config)
  109:     catch _:_ ->
  110: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  111:     end.
  112: 
  113: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  114:     ssl:stop(),
  115:     application:stop(crypto).
  116: 
  117: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  118:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  119: 
  120: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  121:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  122: 
  123: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  124:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  125:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  126:     ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version)]),
  127:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  128:     Config.
  129: 
  130: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  131:     Config.
  132: 
  133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: 
  137: validate_empty_protocols_are_not_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  138:     {error, {options, {next_protocols_advertised, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  139: 	= (catch ssl:listen(9443,
  140: 			    [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>]}])),
  141:     {error, {options, {client_preferred_next_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  142: 	= (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443,
  143: 			     [{verify, verify_none}, {client_preferred_next_protocols,
  144: 			       {client, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>], <<"foox/1">>}}], infinity)),
  145:     Option = {client_preferred_next_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<"">>}},
  146:     {error, {options, Option}} = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443, 
  147:                                                     [{verify, verify_none}, Option], infinity)).
  148: 
  149: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  150: 
  151: validate_empty_advertisement_list_is_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     Option = {next_protocols_advertised, []},
  153:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:listen(0, [Option]),
  154:     ssl:close(Socket).
  155: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  156: 
  157: validate_advertisement_must_be_a_binary_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     Option = {next_protocols_advertised, blah},
  159:     {error, {options, Option}} = (catch ssl:listen(9443, [{verify, verify_none}, Option])).
  160: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  161: 
  162: validate_client_protocols_must_be_a_tuple(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
  163:     Option = {client_preferred_next_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>]},
  164:     {error, {options, Option}} = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443,
  165:                                                     [{verify, verify_none}, Option])).
  166: 
  167: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  168: 
  169: normal_npn_handshake_server_preference(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  171: 			   [{client_preferred_next_protocols,
  172: 			     {server, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}],
  173: 			   [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  174: 			   {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  175: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  176: 
  177: normal_npn_handshake_client_preference(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  179: 			   [{client_preferred_next_protocols,
  180: 			     {client, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}],
  181: 			   [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  182: 			   {ok, <<"http/1.0">>}).
  183: 
  184: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  185: 
  186: fallback_npn_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  187:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  188: 			   [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}],
  189: 			   [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/1">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  190: 			   {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  191: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  192: 
  193: fallback_npn_handshake_server_preference(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  194:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  195: 			   [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}],
  196: 			   [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/1">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  197: 			   {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  198: 
  199: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  200: 
  201: no_client_negotiate_but_server_supports_npn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  202:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  203: 			   [],
  204: 			   [{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/1">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  205: 			   {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  206: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  207: 
  208: 
  209: client_negotiate_server_does_not_support(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     run_npn_handshake(Config,
  211: 			   [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}],
  212: 			   [],
  213: 			   {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  214: 
  215: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  216: renegotiate_from_client_after_npn_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  217:     Data = "hello world",
  218:     
  219:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  220:     ClientOpts = [{client_preferred_next_protocols,
  221: 		   {client, [<<"http/1.0">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  222:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  223:     ServerOpts = [{next_protocols_advertised,
  224: 		   [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}] ++  ServerOpts0,
  225:     ExpectedProtocol = {ok, <<"http/1.0">>},
  226: 
  227:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  228:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  229:                     {from, self()},
  230:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_npn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  231:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  232: 
  233:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  234:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  235:                {host, Hostname},
  236:                {from, self()},
  237:                {mfa, {?MODULE, assert_npn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  238:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  239: 
  240:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  241: 
  242: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  243: npn_handshake_session_reused(Config) when  is_list(Config)->
  244:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  245:     ClientOpts = [{client_preferred_next_protocols,
  246: 		   {client, [<<"http/1.0">>], <<"http/1.1">>}}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  247:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  248:     ServerOpts =[{next_protocols_advertised,
  249: 		   [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}]  ++ ServerOpts0,
  250: 
  251:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  252:     
  253: 
  254: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  255: %% callback functions ------------------------------------------------
  256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  257: 
  258: assert_npn(Socket, Protocol) ->
  259:     ?CT_LOG("Negotiated Protocol ~p, Expecting: ~p ~n",
  260: 		       [ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket), Protocol]),
  261:     Protocol = ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket).
  262: 
  263: assert_npn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  264:     assert_npn(Socket, Protocol),
  265:     ?CT_LOG("Renegotiating ~n", []),
  266:     ok = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  267:     ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  268:     assert_npn(Socket, Protocol),
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: ssl_send_and_assert_npn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  272:     assert_npn(Socket, Protocol),
  273:     ssl_send(Socket, Data).
  274: 
  275: ssl_receive_and_assert_npn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  276:     assert_npn(Socket, Protocol),
  277:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data).
  278: 
  279: ssl_send(Socket, Data) ->
  280:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  281:                [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  282:     ssl:send(Socket, Data).
  283: 
  284: ssl_receive(Socket, Data) ->
  285:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data, []).
  286: 
  287: ssl_receive(Socket, Data, Buffer) ->
  288:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  289:                [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  290:     receive
  291:     {ssl, Socket, MoreData} ->
  292:         ?CT_LOG("Received ~p~n",[MoreData]),
  293:         NewBuffer = Buffer ++ MoreData,
  294:         case NewBuffer of
  295:             Data ->
  296:                 ssl:send(Socket, "Got it"),
  297:                 ok;
  298:             _ ->
  299:                 ssl_receive(Socket, Data, NewBuffer)
  300:         end;
  301:     Other ->
  302:         ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  303:     after 4000 ->
  304:         ct:fail({did_not_get, Data})
  305:     end.
  306: 
  307: 
  308: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
  309:     ssl:connection_information(Socket).
  310: 
  311: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  312: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  313: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  314: run_npn_handshake(Config, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, ExpectedProtocol) ->
  315:     Data = "hello world",
  316: 
  317:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  318:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ClientOpts0,
  319:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  320:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++  ServerOpts0,
  321: 
  322:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  323:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  324:                     {from, self()},
  325:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_npn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  326:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  327: 
  328:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  329:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  330:                {host, Hostname},
  331:                {from, self()},
  332:                {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_send_and_assert_npn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  333:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  334: 
  335:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
